name: Mike Brown
coverLetter:
I have had my own garden and edibles for the last 20 years. Started Hangtown Edibles 5 years ago as a medical marijuana edibles for medical marijuana patients only. I have been trimming for 25 years at least, have my own trim screens and clippers.

I am willing to relocate in order to have the opportunity to work in the industry. If I relocate I would need a place to stay until I can find a place to live. As long as I am paid weekly I can buy my own food and get the things I need to live.

Just looking for the opportunity to work in the industry in anyway I can.

Thanks,

Mike Brown
